Rulings.Tengu: ●For Enraged Battle Ox's effect to activate, the attacked monster must be in Defense Position during damage calculation. So if Final Attack Orders is active, Enraged Battle Ox's effect will not be applied.

Rulings.Base: 1. For the effect of "Enraged Battle Ox" to activate, the attacked monster must be in Defense Position during damage calculation. So if "Final Attack Orders" is active, the effect of "Enraged Battle Ox" will not be applied.
